title: Two-Bit Villains
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: Operating since 2012, Two-Bit Villains is a soda bar and restaurant serving house specialty sodas, shakes, and floats. Provides a food menu with items such veggie burgers, fries, dawgs, and the like.
venueHours: Tue-Thu 11:30am-4:00pm, Wed-Thu 5:30pm-9:30pm, Fri 5:30pm-10:30pm, Fri-Sat 11:30am-5:30pm, Sat 5:30pm-9:30pm, Sun 11:30am-4:00pm
